snippet.title: Brushwood Buddies (Release Trailer)
snippet.description:
Brushwood Buddies is a crafting puzzle game by Steven Colling for Windows and Linux. It's available on Steam (and other stores) here:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/434820

I'm a solo developer from Germany who made Brushwood Buddies on his own, including design, programming, visuals and music, primarily to gather additional funding for my main project Orcish Inn. Check out the website for more information: http://brushwood-buddies.stevencolling.com

The font used in the trailer is BenchNine by Vernon Adams released under the SIL Open Font License. The forest ambient sound was made by nfsgit released under the CC0 License.
